content: burst of popcorns designer aurora suominen/dragonflymomof2 designs©2015 size 6 square using hook h/5 0mm yarn worsted weight in 2 colors a & b ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ ______________________________________________________________ abbreviations & stitches used beg=beginning chain=chain slip_stitch=slip_stitch single_crochet=single_crochet ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ space=spaces skip=skip w/=with double_crochet=double_crochet ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ st s =stitch es lps=loops fpdc=front post double_crochet popcorn=popcorn ​ ​ ​ ​​​ ​ ___________________________________________________________ notes bold print repeated in pattern join join w/slip_stitch in beg st unless otherwise ​​​ ​​ ​​ ​ ​​ stated popcorn 4dc in st remove hook insert hook in 1st double_crochet worked grab lps from ​ ​ 4th double_crochet and pull through round 1 w/a ch4 11dc in 4th chain from hook join 12dc round 2 ch3 fpdc in same st double_crochet fpdc in each st around join 24sts round 3 ch3 double_crochet in same st popcorn in next st 2dc in next st repeat around ending w/popcorn in last st join 24dc 12pc round 4 ch1 fpdc in joining st & next double_crochet together single_crochet fpsc in next pcst fpdc in next 2sts together repeat around ending w/fpsc in last popcorn join 12dc 24sc aurora suominen/dragonflymomof2designs ©copyright 2015 all rights reserved burst of popcorns 1 round 5 slip_stitch in next st ch3 double_crochet in next st fpdc in popcorn below popcorn in next st double_crochet in 2sts repeat around ending w/popcorn in last st switch to b w/slip_stitch to join 36dc 12pc round 6 ch3 double_crochet ch1 2dc in same st double_crochet in 2sts half_double_crochet in 7sts double_crochet in 2sts 2dc ch1 2dc in next space 4x minus last corner join 32dc 28hdc round 7 ch2 half_double_crochet in next st 3hdc in next space half_double_crochet in 15sts 4x ending w/double_crochet in last 13sts join 72hdc fasten_off personal use/print only no pattern reproductions selling or copying allowed see my designs & videos on my blog http //myblueangels blogspot com/ ​​ download pattern on ravelry http //www ravelry
